analysis.description:
Lotthereum.closeRound (/unique_chucks/20/0x5e6ed16d845a46b9f863a256e7a3194f2a9e8b5c.sol#100-109) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- Lotthereum.rounds
	- Lotthereum.currentRound
	- Lotthereum.balances

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/20/0x5e6ed16d845a46b9f863a256e7a3194f2a9e8b5c.sol#116-117:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/20/0x5e6ed16d845a46b9f863a256e7a3194f2a9e8b5c.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.11 (/unique_chucks/20/0x5e6ed16d845a46b9f863a256e7a3194f2a9e8b5c.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_blockPointer' of Lotthereum.Lotthereum (/unique_chucks/20/0x5e6ed16d845a46b9f863a256e7a3194f2a9e8b5c.sol#66) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_maxNumberOfBets' of Lotthereum.Lotthereum (/unique_chucks/20/0x5e6ed16d845a46b9f863a256e7a3194f2a9e8b5c.sol#66-67) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_minAmountByBet' of Lotthereum.Lotthereum (/unique_chucks/20/0x5e6ed16d845a46b9f863a256e7a3194f2a9e8b5c.sol#67) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_prize' of Lotthereum.Lotthereum (/unique_chucks/20/0x5e6ed16d845a46b9f863a256e7a3194f2a9e8b5c.sol#67-68) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_hash' of Lotthereum.Lotthereum (/unique_chucks/20/0x5e6ed16d845a46b9f863a256e7a3194f2a9e8b5c.sol#68) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_a' of Lotthereum.getNumber (/unique_chucks/20/0x5e6ed16d845a46b9f863a256e7a3194f2a9e8b5c.sol#118-119) is not in mixedCase
